name: ReMe
description: 智能体记忆管理工具包，提供模块化能力来跨用户、任务和代理提取、复用和共享记忆

innovations.title: Modular Memory Architecture
innovations.description: Provides pluggable memory components supporting personal, task, tool, and working memory types, enabling flexible memory management for different agent scenarios

innovations.title: Cross-entity Memory Sharing
innovations.description: Enables memory sharing across users, tasks, and agents through a unified vector database backend, allowing knowledge reuse and collective learning

innovations.title: Multi-backend Vector Storage
innovations.description: Supports 5 different vector database backends (SQLite, Elasticsearch, ChromaDB, Qdrant, PostgreSQL) with unified interface, providing flexibility from small deployments to enterprise scale

innovations.title: Multi-interface Deployment
innovations.description: Offers HTTP API, MCP (Model Context Protocol), and Python SDK interfaces, enabling seamless integration with different agent frameworks and clients

innovations.title: LLM-driven Memory Operations
innovations.description: Leverages LLMs for intelligent memory extraction, summarization, and retrieval through specialized agents, improving memory quality and relevance

innovations.title: Working Memory Compression
innovations.description: Automatically compresses long-running agent contexts to avoid token overflow, enabling extended interactions with limited context windows

use_cases.title: Personal AI Assistant
use_cases.description: Build long-term user companions that remember preferences, context, and personal history. ReMe's personal memory enables context-aware responses and personalized recommendations.

use_cases.title: Enterprise Task Automation
use_cases.description: Enable agents to learn from task execution history and apply patterns to new tasks. Task memory captures success/failure patterns and comparative analysis for continuous improvement.

use_cases.title: Multi-tool Agent Optimization
use_cases.description: Optimize tool selection and parameter usage through memory of historical performance. Tool memory enables data-driven decisions for complex multi-tool workflows.

use_cases.title: Long-context Conversational AI
use_cases.description: Support extended conversations and interactions beyond context window limits. Working memory compression enables seamless multi-turn dialogues with large language models.

use_cases.title: Multi-agent Collaborative Systems
use_cases.description: Enable knowledge sharing between agents through centralized memory. ReMe's memory sharing allows agents to leverage collective experience and reduce individual training requirements.

use_cases.title: Specialized Agent Swarms
use_cases.description: Create task-specific agent teams that share specialized knowledge through ReMe. Each agent team can maintain domain-specific memory while benefiting from cross-team insights.

use_cases.title: SaaS Agent Platform
use_cases.description: Build AI-powered SaaS services with per-user memory isolation. ReMe's multi-tenant capabilities enable building scalable platforms where each customer has isolated memory spaces.

use_cases.title: Benchmark Improvement
use_cases.description: Demonstrated performance improvements on standard benchmarks: AppWorld (+3.46%), BFCL-V3 (+6.22%), FrozenLake (+6%), Tool Memory (+14.88%). ReMe memory significantly enhances agent capabilities.

value_propositions.name: 模块化多类型记忆
value_propositions.description: 通过可插拔记忆组件支持个人、任务、工具和工作记忆四种类型,采用5种向量数据库后端(SQLite、Elasticsearch、ChromaDB、Qdrant、PostgreSQL)统一接口,实现从小型部署到企业级规模的灵活记忆管理,在AppWorld、BFCL(v3)、FrozenLake基准测试中验证有效性。

value_propositions.name: 跨实体记忆共享与压缩
value_propositions.description: 通过统一向量数据库后端实现跨用户、任务和代理的记忆共享和集体学习,采用LLM驱动的记忆操作(提取、摘要、检索)和工作记忆压缩避免token溢出,支持MCP协议、HTTP API和Python SDK多接口部署,实现长期交互的上下文延续。
